# particleColorSequence

**Instance Property**

The sequence used to specify the color components of a particle over its lifetime.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var particleColorSequence: SKKeyframeSequence? { get set }
```

```swift
var particleColorSequence: SKKeyframeSequence? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `nil`. If a non-`nil` value is specified, then the [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKEmitterNode/particleColor], [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKEmitterNode/particleColorAlphaRange], [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKEmitterNode/particleColorRedRange], [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKEmitterNode/particleColorGreenRange], [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKEmitterNode/particleColorBlueRange], [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKEmitterNode/particleColorAlphaSpeed], [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKEmitterNode/particleColorRedSpeed], [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKEmitterNode/particleColorGreenSpeed], and [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKEmitterNode/particleColorBlueSpeed] properties are ignored. Instead, the sequence is used to specify the particle color.



## Configuring Particle Color

- **particleColor**: The average initial color for a particle.
- **particleColorAlphaRange**: The range of allowed random values for the alpha component of a particle’s initial color.
- **particleColorBlueRange**: The range of allowed random values for the blue component of a particle’s initial color.
- **particleColorGreenRange**: The range of allowed random values for the green component of a particle’s initial color.
- **particleColorRedRange**: The range of allowed random values for the red component of a particle’s initial color.
- **particleColorAlphaSpeed**: The rate at which the alpha component of a particle’s color changes per second.
- **particleColorBlueSpeed**: The rate at which the blue component of a particle’s color changes per second.
- **particleColorGreenSpeed**: The rate at which the green component of a particle’s color changes per second.
- **particleColorRedSpeed**: The rate at which the red component of a particle’s color changes per second.
